A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie\, and it is probably my favorite SW film. While it is not perfect\, it still maintains that SW feel. Don't be swayed by all the negative comments\, see it for yourself. This film is different while it still does the Empire & Return of the Jedi storylines like Attack of the Clones but better. Can't wait for episode 9! Loved this movie so much\, the critic's were right!
